newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RUGBY UNION-AUCKLAND BEATS GAUTENG LIONS 63-22.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-AUCKLAND BEATS GAUTENG LIONS 63-22.

text.p: The Auckland Blues beat the Gauteng Lions by 63-22 (halftime 29-15) in a Super 12 match at Eden Park on Saturday.

Scorers - Auckland Blues:- Tries: Ofisa Tonu'u (2), Zinzan Brooke (2), Leo Lafaiali'i, Joeli Vidiri, Carlos Spencer, Dylan Mika, Michael Jones, Jeremy Stanley; Penalty: Spencer; Conversions: Spencer (5)
Gauteng Lions:- Tries: Warren Brosnahan, Johan Roux, Japie Mulder; Penalty: Roux; Conversions: Roux (2).
